name: Olivia
text: Here is my best friend, Recton.

name: Olivia
text:
He is such a great friend to have around. 
When you need him, he's always there.

name: Olivia
text:
Use the A, W, S, D keys to teleport to 
different spots on the map.

name: Olivia
text:
Small biters will continue to track your 
movements, so be careful.

name: Olivia
text:
Let me know when you are ready to move on 
to the next tutorial.
